titles.title: William H. Donham State Fish Hatchery Conveyance Act of 1994
To require the Secretary of the Interior to convey the William H. Donham State Fish Hatchery to the State of Arkansas.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E478)
Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries Management.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

bill.summary: 3/17/1994--Introduced. William H. Donham State Fish Hatchery Conveyance Act of 1994 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey the William H. Donham State Fish Hatchery to Arkansas.
